title: Sovereign AGI Generic System Configuration (GSC) Schema
description: Defines the structure for autonomous evolution tasks and code scaffolding directives.

task_id.description: Unique identifier for the evolution task.

execution_mode.description: Mode determining how the evolution task is executed.

evolution_targets.description: List of files or components designated for analysis and potential evolution.

directives.description: Specific, actionable, and structured commands for the AGI to follow.

context_constraints.description: Limits and context definition for the evolution process.

max_context_size.description: Maximum size (tokens) of the working context window for the AGI.

items.description: Specific external tools (e.g., git, npm) prohibited during this task execution.

path.description: The relative path to the file or directory.

current_hash.description: Optional SHA hash for version locking/verification.

intent.description: Primary goal related to this target artifact.

parameters.description: Structured key/value parameters specific to the directive type.
Parameters required for extracting a function to a new location.
Parameters required for specifying a dependency upgrade.
